structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Whenever any other restrictions or covenants impose a higher standard than permitted by this chapter, then such other restriction or covenant shall govern.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 37, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 76.
